Key Match Events: Bradley Barcola scored a goal after just 13 seconds for France
Federico Dimarco scored a goal for Italy to equalize
Davide Frattesi scored a goal for Italy to put them ahead
Giacomo Raspadori scored a goal for Italy to secure a 3-1 victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in the Parc des Princes in Paris
Others: The match was part of the UEFA Nations League
